SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Create a Custom Personalization Attribution Data Model Object from a CSV File

Use the provided CSV files to manually create data model objects (DMOs) for Einstein Personalization attribution.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create custom DMOs from a file:	

Data Cloud Admin OR

Data Cloud for Marketing Admin OR

Data Cloud for Marketing Data Aware Specialist

In Data Cloud, on the Data Model tab, click New.
Select From File, and click Next.
Select Csv file has a header row, and click Choose File.
Each CSV file contains four columns in this order—Field Label, Field API Name, Data Type, and Primary Key.
To upload the CSV file, click Choose File.
Use the corresponding reference to set the attribution object’s values.
CSV FILE NAME	REFERENCE
PersonalizationPointViewAttribution.csv	Personalization Point View Attribution Data Model Object
PersonalizationContentViewAttribution.csv	Personalization Content View Attribution Data Model Object
PersonalizationPointClickAttribution.csv	Personalization Point Click Attribution Data Model Object
PersonalizationContentClickAttribution.csv	Personalization Content Click Attribution Data Model Objects
Click Next.
Enter the object details for Object Label, Category, and Object Description from the corresponding reference. Object API Name is auto-filled.
Make sure that the uploaded field attributes match the structure in Attribution Data Model Object CSV File References.
Save your work.
Repeat these steps for each attribution DMO that you want to create.
SEE ALSO
Salesforce Help: Create a Custom Data Model Object from a CSV File

title: Creating Custom Personalization Attribution Objects in Einstein Personalization
